channel.title: Heart-and-Music Radio
channel.description: Come discover the arts and the artists with your friends at Heart-and-music.

item.title: Heart and Music Radio for April 16, 2007
item.description: Today we return from a long hiatus. Our show is taking some exciting new turns, and today you'll hear about them.

item.title: Heart and Music Radio for April 23, 2007
item.description: Today Julie begins a series on the interesting relationship between music and science.
